bibl.title: Letter from S.L. Jennings to Philip Showalter Hench, October 21, 1948

div1.p: Jennings informs Hench that the Cuban defense ministry has granted approval of the sale of aerial photographs of Cuba to Hench.

div1.head: Letter from S.L. Jennings to Philip Showalter Hench, October 21, 1948
div1.opener:
DEPARTMENT OF THE AIR FORCE
HEADQUARTERS UNITED STATES AIR FORCE
WASHINGTON
21 OCT 1948
LIB 5835
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Attention: Dr. P. S. Hench
Gentlemen:
div1.p:
Reference is made to your letter of 23 April 1948, and to
letter of this office dated 11 June 1948, in regard to your
request for aerial photographs of areas of Cuba.

Approval for release of the photographs has been received
from the Cuban Ministry of National Defense.

There are available thirteen (13) aerial photographs cover-
ing the areas of your interest, which can be procured on single
weight glossy finish at $0.50 each, in accordance with the attach-
ed information sheet.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, S. L. JENNINGS
Lt. Colonel, USAF
Chief, Photographic Records & Services Division
Office of the Air Adjutant General Incl
Information Sheet
